popover.title: Welcome to Chiara Gesture's training portal!
popover.description:
First off, follow this short guide to know how this webpage works.

This is the navigation bar, from where you'll be able to access all the sites within the page. Let's see what these buttons do...

popover.title: Collect button
popover.description: By clicking this button, you'll access the page from where you'll be able to record sample videos and upload them to Chiara.

popover.title: Train button
popover.description: By clicking this button, you'll access the training page. In said page, you can train a neural network with artificial intelligence, and teach Chiara to recognise the gestures uploaded from the collect page.

popover.title: Play button
popover.description: Clicking this button will lead you to the play site. Here you can have fun testing Chiara's ability to recognise the gestures based on the videos you recorded on the collect page.

popover.title: Choose a gesture complexity
popover.description: By clicking on the rectangle, a dropdown menu will appear. In that dropdown, choose a gesture complexity to tell Chiara how sophisticated you're going to get :)

popover.title: Choose gesture
popover.description: When you click on the rectangle, depending on what complexity you chose on the prior step, different gestures will appear. Choose one of them!

popover.title: Collect's main interface
popover.description: In just this section of the collect page, you will be able to record your sample video and send it to Chiara. But what do these buttons do?

popover.title: Maximum recording time
popover.description: Here, you can specify how long (at a maximum), you want the recording to last. It should be between 5 and 30 seconds. If you choose not to change it, the default value is 5 seconds.

popover.title: Recording delay
popover.description: In this field, you can set a delay between you pressing the start button and the recording starting. Please note that when the recording starts, you should be in the correct position. The delay should be between 3 and 30 seconds (by default it is set to 5).

popover.title: Start button
popover.description: When you feel ready to start or if you want to record another sample of the same gesture, just click this button. <u>But not yet!</u> There are still some things I have to show you...

popover.title: Stop button
popover.description: If you think your sample video is complete, or if you want to start a new one, press this button to stop the recording immediately.

popover.title: Upload button
popover.description: After a successful recording, click the upload button to send your video to Chiara! Note that Chiara will receive the video linked with the gesture and gesture complexity you chose before, so don't upload a sample video that doesn't match your gesture selection.

popover.title: Preview and recorded section
popover.description:
While you record your sample video, you'll always be able to see yourself in this camera feed.

Also, when a recording is stopped or finished, the recording will be available to you right here.

popover.title: Example gesture video
popover.description: Once you select a gesture and a gesture complexity, a recorded video from one of our team members will appear right here for you to learn what your selected gesture is about. Based on this video, you'll have to replicate what you've seen, on the sample video you are taking.

popover.title: You're ready 游꿀
popover.description: Now that I've shown you around the collect site, you are ready to record your own samples!
